Definition: A comparison of the relative luminance between two colors. The minimum and maximum range is 1 and 21 respectively.
An algorithm proposed for inclusion in WCAG 3.0 that attempts to more accurately describe contrast relative to human perception.
A tool that can determine the color of a region or, more commonly, an individual pixel on the screen
A Red, Green, and Blue value under the IEC 61966-2-1 [1] standard
